entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Varennes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
